h1_38: Case Western Reserve University/University Hospitals Cleveland Medical Center Program
h3_39: Case Western Reserve University/University Hospitals Cleveland Medical Center
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_81: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: All graduating residents have placed in one of their top three choices for fellowship. Our UH residents are represented in highly regarded programs throughout the country. STATdx, RadPrimer, Casestacks and e-anatomy available to residents in addition to a well-supplied library. Residents are also given iPads during their first year of residency to use throughout their residency training.

p_354: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
